Articles.Content:
I suggest that flags should somehow display who placed it (either on the plaque or somehow in the name, e.g. "My Awesome Flag (planted by Jebediah Kerman). I don't want to manually insert the name of the Kerbal who planted it in the plaque. That's it. Thank you for listening.

Ah, and: obligatory smiley!

Well... I see this as already basically in the game already.

If you want a flag unique to you, and ONLY you, then go and create a flag and place it in the "flags" folder in the KSP game folders. Other than that, all you have to do is change what the plaque on the flag says. You can include the kerbonauts you used.
Information about which Kerbal has placed which flag is present in the persistence data, it just cannot be directly seen in game.
